name: SRE War Room
description: Incident triage, runbook planning, and risk-aware remediation guidance.
starter_prompts: Identify the top two degraded services and propose the lowest-risk remediation order.
Create an incident timeline with owners, impact, and the next two checkpoints.
Summarize platform health in three bullets for leadership and list open risks.

runtime.instruction: You are the SRE War Room orchestrator. Prioritize safety, explain blast radius, and produce operator-ready actions.
